Ki Barrier.name: Ki Barrier
Ki Barrier.blurb: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
Ki Barrier.description: Innate: After completing an ability's effects, Shen  shields himself from 50 − 101 (based on level) (+ 14% bonus health) damage for 2.5 seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one champion, Ki Barrier's  cooldown is reduced by 4 − 7.5 (based on level) seconds.
Ki Barrier.description2: Shen's power manifests as a Spirit Blade that he can control with his abilities.
Ki Barrier.notes:
* The Spirit Blade spawns with Shen, jumps closer to him if he gets too far away, and blinks to him if he uses any global blink ( Teleport,  Recall,  Abyssal Voyage, or  Stand United).
 Enemies see an arrow pointing from Shen to the location of his Spirit Blade even if it is not visible.
  Twilight Assault will grant no shield if the Spirit Blade is stopped before it reaches Shen.
  Spirit's Refuge will give the shield after the protective zone disappears.
  Shadow Dash will give the shield when the dash ends.
 If the dash is  interrupted, the shield will instead be received the moment the crowd control is applied, before damage calculation (if any).

Twilight Assault.name: Twilight Assault
Twilight Assault.blurb: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
Twilight Assault.description: Active: Shen recalls his Spirit Blade to his location. Enemies the blade collides with are  slowed for the next 2 seconds when moving away from Shen.
Twilight Assault.description2: Once it arrives, Shen empowers his next 3 basic attacks within 8 seconds to gain  75 bonus range and deal  bonus magic damage.
Twilight Assault.leveling2:
Bonus Magic Damage:
10 − 40 (based on level) (+ 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
Total Damage:
30 − 120 (based on level) (+ 6 / 7.5 / 9 / 10.5 / 12% (+ 4.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
Twilight Assault.description3: If the Spirit Blade collides with an enemy champion, the empowerment is enhanced, dealing increased bonus magic damage and gaining  50% bonus attack speed.
Twilight Assault.leveling3:
Increased Bonus Damage:
10 − 40 (based on level) (+ 5 / 5.5 / 6 / 6.5 / 7% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
Total Increased Damage:
30 − 120 (based on level) (+ 15 / 16.5 / 18 / 19.5 / 21% (+ 6% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
Twilight Assault.description4: Empowered attacks against  monsters instead deal 100% bonus damage, but their total damage is capped.
Twilight Assault.notes:
* The Spirit Blade would stop if colliding with  Wind Wall or  Unbreakable.
 The magic damage would not be  parried.

Spirit's Refuge.name: Spirit's Refuge
Spirit's Refuge.blurb: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
Spirit's Refuge.description: Active: Shen primes his Spirit Blade, creating an area around it. If Shen or an allied champion enter the area, or after 2 seconds, the Spirit Blade creates a protective zone around it for 1.75 seconds, blocking all enemy basic attacks in the area.
Spirit's Refuge.notes:
* Spirit's Refuge's protective zone can be moved while active if Shen uses  Twilight Assault.
 Spirit's Refuge cannot be ranked up at level 1.
 Spirit's Refuge will also dodge abilities that can trigger on-hit effects ( Parrrley,  Mystic Shot)

Shadow Dash.name: Shadow Dash
Shadow Dash.blurb: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
Shadow Dash.description: Passive: Damage from Shadow Dash and  Twilight Assault recovers  30 / 35 / 40 (based on level) energy.
Shadow Dash.description2: Active: Shen  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemy champions and  monsters he hits and  taunting them for 1.5 seconds.
Shadow Dash.notes: * Using  Flash during the animation of Shadow Dash will stop the dash, but will taunt and damage enemies in contact with him at the destination.

Stand United.name: Stand United
Stand United.blurb: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
Stand United.description: Active: Shen channels for 3 seconds,  shielding the target allied champion for up to 5 seconds, increased by 0% − 60% (based on target's missing health).
Stand United.description2: Upon completing the channel, Shen and his Spirit Blade  blink to the target ally's location.
Stand United.notes:
* Shen cannot target himself but can alternatively target allies by clicking their portraits on the right side of the screen or by using the F2 - F5 keys (none of this can be done if he is affected by  nearsight).
  Invisible or  camouflaged allies are not revealed by Stand United.
 Shen will continue channeling and eventually blink so long as Stand United's target is alive (even if the shield is broken).
 Interrupting Stand United's channel will not remove the shield prematurely.
